original_text: ‘At that time, you will again be my people, and I will be your God. ’ ‘At that time, you will again be my people, and I will be your God. ’ ‘At that time, you will again be my people,
korean_text: 너희는 내 백성이 되겠고 나는 너희들의 하나님이 되리라

sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 다시 내 백성이 될 것이며
